snippet.title: Three Days To Chicago - Trailer
snippet.description: Three Days to Chicago is a visual novel where you explore a potential romance on a 3-day cross-country trip by train. This focuses on two gay bears, making this not just a unique game, but also a visually stunning one since all the art is based on photography of a real trip.

localized.description: Three Days to Chicago is a visual novel where you explore a potential romance on a 3-day cross-country trip by train. This focuses on two gay bears, making this not just a unique game, but also a visually stunning one since all the art is based on photography of a real trip.
